pronunciation: ED'IFY, [Latin oedifico; oedes, a house, and facio, to make.]

definitions.text:
1. To build, literal sense. [Not now used.]
2. To instruct improve the mind knowledge generally, particularly moral religious knowledge, faith holiness.Edify one another. 1 Thessalonians 5:11.
3. To teach or persuade. [Not used.]
